snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission brought a case against a tiny ratings agency, but has not moved against executives of any major firm for actions leading to the financial crisis.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission brought a case against a tiny ratings agency, but has not moved against executives of any major firm for actions leading to the financial crisis.

headline.main: Taking On the Little Guy, but Missing the Bigger Ones
headline.print_headline: The Trade: Taking On the Little Guy, but Missing the Bigger Ones

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
